description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Are you fast enough? You have 10 seconds or less to find and locate each target. Rack up points with speed and accuracy as you search through this challenging photo based adventure.
